snippet.title: Ravenswatch - Fall of Avalon Update (Reveal Date Trailer)
snippet.description:
Play Ravenswatch Early Access on Steam now: http://nacon.me/Ravenswatch

A new adventure awaits you, Heroes of the Ravenswatch! Nightmares have invaded Reverie's last stronghold, and you're the last hope! The third Chapter of Ravenswatch arrives.

The Fall of Avalon update is coming out in the Early Access on April 22nd on Steam!

Ravenswatch will be available in 2024 on PC, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch™.

Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/PlayRavenswatch
-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
